text.div:
ResourceStabilityVS ValueSet

Terms that describe the possibility of losing access to a resource.

name: ResourceStabilityVS
title: ResourceStabilityVS
description: Terms that describe the possibility of losing access to a resource.

concept.display: Not at risk or minimal risk of losing the resource (or a significant portion of the income)
Some risk of losing the resource (or a significant portion of the resource)
Imminent risk of loss of the resource (or a significant portion of the resource)
Recent loss of the resource (or a significant portion of the resource)
